content.rendered: The various awards we have received over the years, are owed to the efforts of the many talented and dedicated employees across Gulshan Group, and the business partners who back our every endeavour.

excerpt.rendered: The various awards we have received over the years, are owed to the efforts of the many talented and dedicated employees across Gulshan Group, and the business partners who back our every endeavour.
